data.message: Can't wait for this album to drop it's gonna hopefully be amazing and something fresh. Also I wanna let y'all know I love each and every one of you equally no matter what you've done, been through or are going through you're beautiful and worth it remember that you have a purpose just like evrryone else just make sure you stand out when you are accomplishing your goals and purpose😊😘💖💗

replies.message: If it's anything like that shitty freestyle... I wouldn't hold my breathe. Besides he's doomed to flop after alienating half of his fan base.
